New Records: LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father-son duo to play together in NBA history.
Key Match Events: LeBron James made a 3-pointer and an and-1 layup with Bronny on the floor.
Bronny James missed a 3-pointer set up by his father.
Pre-Game Insights: Lakers coach JJ Redick planned on playing LeBron and Bronny within the flow of the game and not in a 'gimmicky' manner.
Redick expressed honor in being part of history.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed his feelings about the surreal experience of playing with his son.
LeBron James shared his message to Bronny about continuing to improve and make winning plays.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked Bronny James' 20th birthday, celebrated with a cake and cupcakes by the Lakers.
LeBron and Anthony Davis rested for the second half of the game.
